transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Haan haan Meenakshi mam. Main bol rahi hu.

Customer: Haan haan mam. I am really sorry main aapko call nahi payi subah se actually bahut back to back meetings ho gayi thi. Haan bataiye.

Customer: Mam main actually ye keh rahi hu. Ek to please aapse request hai within two or three days. Main ye nahi keh rahi hu aap mere ko roz karo lekin kam se kam teen din me to aap mere ko ek phone fix kar lo karna. Ye baat maine aapse pehle bhi maine aapse request kiya tha. You said ki haan mam main aapko kar liya karungi.

Executive: Actually kya hota hai na mam bas main aapko kya batau jaise aap pure din aaj meeting me rahenge kabhi kabhi na hamari aise meeting ho jati hai.

Customer: Aapko main nahi keh rahi hu aap theek hai third day aap nahi kar paye hoge fourth day to kar lo.

Executive: Haan.

Customer: Matlab main from one from one week I am I was waiting for your call ki aap aa jaye kyuki na maine aapka number actually me jo save kar rakha tha ek to mujhe aapka naam yaad nahi tha aur IndiaMART se kya kar rakha hai maine jitni queries aati hai na wo sabhi ko maine IndiaMART ke naam se save kar diya.

Customer: So I was very confused ki aapka number kaun se wala hai.

Executive: It's okay koi baat nahi ab to aapka isme haan ab aap mera naam se save kar lena Shivani account manager IndiaMART aise aap kar lena.

Customer: Haan wahi main wahi main karungi ab account manager save karungi kyuki account manager na Vidushi ka to save kiya hua tha aapke wala maine nahi kiya hua us din.

Executive: Mam Vidushi wale number aap delete kar dena.

Customer: Hmm hmm.

Customer: To mam main baat aapse ye puch rahi hu ki mam query ke liye main bahut pareshan ho gayi hu matlab query ka same wahi process hai aap log na jo notification me aapki query dikhti hai wo dikhti hai 1000 piece 2000 piece 3000 piece.

Customer: Aur jab aap usko click karoge na wo hoti hai 100 piece 50 piece aur 10 piece bhi hoti hai.

Customer: Aur aisa continuously hai main aapko kahoge to main screenshot le le ke de dungi. Mere paas notification me aa raha hai ki 1000 piece ki query hai aur main usko jaise click karungi wo niklegi 100 ya 10 piece ki.

Executive: Okay okay okay.

Executive: To aap ek cheez mujhe batao jab aap buyer se buyer karke aap mujhe bata rahi ho ya fir jab aap click kar rahe ho tab aa rahi hai.

Customer: Nahi matlab jab click kar rahi hu tab bol rahi hu.

Executive: Matlab aisa kabhi hua hai aapko abhi aap mujhe ek cheez feedback do jaise maan lo aapne kisi client ko pakda theek hai baat ki unse baat karte karte matlab aapne sirf normally dekh liya ki 100 1000 pieces ki hai list aapne baat ki usme nikla ki 100 pieces ki abhi aapki buyer se baat nahi hui hai lekin baad me aapki buyer se baat kar rahe ho aap buyer se baat karke nikal raha hai ki kuch aur hi unka requirement thi aisa kuch hua hai aapke sath.

Customer: Wo to mam kai baar hua hai ki matlab ek second hello.

Executive: Haan Sangeeta.

Customer: Matlab.

Executive: Hello.

Executive: Yes sir. Mam main ye keh rahi thi na kai baar kya hua jaise ki query koi query aayi humne unko phone kiya to they said ki mam wo bete ne galti se kar diya hoga ya mam mere ko na abhi march me business karna hai to main uske liye bottle dekh raha tha.

Executive: Achcha.

Executive: Koi koi customer aisa hota hai ki mam main online karne ki soch raha tha to uske liye main ek baar bas query karke dekh raha tha aur ek to aisa tha banda ki jisko maine call kiya hand to hand he said ki madam galti kar di query karke keh rahe ki 10 logo ne phone kar karke pareshan kar diya.

Executive: Ek ka to aise reply aaya.

Customer: Matlab mere paas query aayi hai aur maine usko call kiya to that means ki mere paas query late aayi hai. Tabhi to wo pehle ke 10 log usko phone kar chuke hai.

Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Ek second main check kar rahi hu. Aap ek cheez mujhe batao aap jo lead consume kar rahe ho buyer ka engagement dekh ke hi consume kar rahe ho.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Aap jo lead consume kar rahe ho wo buyer ka engagement yani ki buyer kitna saal purana hai wahi check karke lead consume ki aapne aisa.

Customer: Mam mere paas aayi hoti hai to main kar leti hu ab mere paas jo aata hai usme ki matlab mere account se related hi to aati hongi na.

Executive: Nahi aisa hota hai na ki jaise maan lo abhi mere paas na main abhi apne mam jo aapne mujhe link share kare the jo aapne mujhe link share kare the usme puraane saal nisaan wale un logo ko bottle nahi chahiye thi.

Customer: Chahiye nahi thi.

Customer: Nahi keh rahe ki nahi mam hame abhi requirement nahi hai aur ek do ne aisa bola ki nahi mam hamari fulfill ho gayi.

Executive: Fulfil ho gayi hai. Okay.

Executive: Yes. Aapko Vidushi ne wo trade.indiamart wala option bhi bata chuki thi hai na.

Customer: Yes mam aapne wahi se to di thi mujhe queries.

Executive: Haan to waha se aapne try kiya tha.

Customer: Mam waha se to maine dobara try nahi kara hai but the thing I was saying ki jo mere paas jo query aati hai wo mere paas 2000 3000 piece ki aati hai aur jab us pe click karte ho to 10 piece hi nikalti hai aisa kyu.

Executive: Hmm hmm. Ye actually ye issue to bahut bada hai main ek baar iske liye na senior se ek extra pe mail karwati hu. Main aapka case na ab haan madam ko transfer kar rahi hu. Theek hai to wo ek mail karengi us mail pe hamare jitni bhi backend process rahegi wo sab available rahenge aur aap aisa kar sakte ho mam ki jo lead aap consume kar rahe ho uska ek chhoti si video banaye ya fir screenshot aap de sakte ho.

Customer: Haan mam ab to main kar dungi.

Executive: Haan taki hamare paas ek proof rahega ki haan buyer client ko hamari dikkat ho rahi hai.

Customer: Theek hai mam ab to kar dungi.

Executive: Aap mujhe thoda sa time do kal tak main iska revert batati hu pehle kyuki mujhe bhi mail karna hoga fir mail se revert aayega tabhi main aapko proper answer de paungi.

Customer: Matlab main aapko mail karu.

Executive: Nahi aap mujhe mail mat karo aap mujhe bas wo screenshot bhej do kyuki mail to mujhe hi karna hai hai na.

Customer: Theek hai theek hai.

Executive: Aap check karke bas screenshot mujhe bhej do aap.

Customer: Theek hai.

Executive: Okay mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Query showing different quantity in notification vs click.

- Receiving late queries after others have contacted.

- Links shared earlier did not fulfill requirements.



Resolution:

- Executive will escalate the query issue.

- Customer agreed to send screenshots of the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will revert by tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- query, notification, leads, resolution, screenshot
